entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
